html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-05242020-06-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  PHAC
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Mandatory Isolation), No. 3
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (MANDATORY ISOLATION), NO. 3 in order to (1) support Canada’s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country; (2) continue applying stringent measures to reduce the spread by persons who do not have symptoms on arrival at the border as well as symptomatic entrants; (3) make non-substantive changes to provide additional clarity on provisions throughout the Order; and (4) extend the effective date of the previous Order until August 31, 2020.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Minimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Mandatory Isolation), No. 3
precis: MINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (MANDATORY ISOLATION), NO. 3  in order to (1) support Canada’s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country; (2) continue applying stringent measures to reduce the spread by persons who do not have symptoms on arrival at the border as well as symptomatic entrants; (3) make non-substantive changes to provide additional clarity on provisions throughout the Order; and (4) extend the effective date of the previous Order until August 31, 2020.
